## Key Information

- **Server URL**: `https://sonarqube-mcp.bitso.io/mcp`
- **No tokens required** - authentication handled by remote server
- **IntelliJ config**: `~/.config/github-copilot/intellij/mcp.json`
- **Copilot CLI config**: `~/.copilot/mcp-config.json`
